00024 Class MysqliDriver implements DatabaseDriverInterface {
00025         
00032         private $mysqli;
00033         
00040         private $result;
00041         
00057         public function connect($params) {
00058                 
00059                 $defaults = array(
00060                         'server' => null,
00061                         'user' => null,
00062                         'password' => null,
00063                 );
00064                 if(is_string($params)) $params = array('database' => $params);
00065                 $params = array_merge($defaults, $params);
00066                 if(!isset($params['database'])) throw new BadArgumentException("MysqliDriver::connect() requires 'database' key to be present in parameter 1.");
00067                 
00068                 $this->mysqli = new MySQLi($params['server'], $params['user'], $params['password'], $params['database']);
00069                 
00070                 if(!$this->mysqli or $this->mysqli->connect_error) throw new DatabaseConnectionException('MysqliDriver', $this->mysqli->connect_error);
00071                 return true;
00072         }
00073         
00081         public function query($sql) {
00082                 
00083                 if($this->result instanceof MySQLi_Result) $this->result->free();
00084                 return (bool) ($this->result = $this->mysqli->query($sql));
00085                 
00086         }
00087         
00094         public function getArray() {
00095                 
00096                 if(!($this->result instanceof MySQLi_Result)) {
00097                         throw new MySQLiBadResultException();
00098                         return false;
00099                 }
00100                 
00101                 $return = $this->result->fetch_assoc();
00102                 if(!empty($return)) foreach($return as &$value) if(is_numeric($value)) $value = (int)$value;
00103                 return $return;
00104                 
00105         }
00106         
00115         public function getObject($className = 'StdClass', $params = null) {
00116                 
00117                 if(!($this->result instanceof MySQLi_Result)) {
00118                         throw new MySQLiBadResultException();
00119                         return false;
00120                 }
00121                 
00122                 $return = (empty($params) ? $this->result->fetch_object($className) : $this->result->fetch_object($className, $params));
00123                 if(!empty($return)) foreach($return as &$value) if(is_numeric($value)) $value = (int)$value;
00124                 return $return;
00125                 
00126         }
00127         
00134         public function rewind() {
00135                 
00136                 if($this->result instanceof MySQLi_Result) $this->result->data_seek(0);
00137                 else throw new MySQLiBadResultException();
00138                 
00139         }
00140

00148                 
00149                 return $this->mysqli->error ?: false;
00150                 
00151         }
00152         
00159         public function getInsertId() {

00162                 
00163         }
00164         
00171         public function getNumResultRows() {
00172                 
00173                 return $this->result instanceof MySQLi_Result ? $this->result->num_rows : false;
00174                 
00175         }
00176         
00183         public function getNumAffectedRows() {
00184                 
00185                 return $this->mysqli->affected_rows > -1 ? $this->mysqli->affected_rows : false;
00186                 
00187         }
